string.value: When you level up, you get 5 Ability Points (AP) to use to upgrade your abilities. Use the hotkey S your AP.
Wow, you're pretty good. Are you assigning your Ability Points (AP) well? You know you get those after leveling up, right? Talk to me when you're ready for the 6th question.

Every time you level up, you can raise your character's ability stats. How many ability points (AP) are you awarded after every level up? 

#L0##b2 points#l
#L1#10 points #l
#L2#5 points #k#l
That's right. Every time you level up, you're awarded #r5 AP#k, which can be used to raise your character's abilities. Press #bS#k after every level up and make sure to assign those points well.
Come on, you get more than 2 measly points! You should check your AP after leveling up by pressing S.
Nope, not 10 points. Press S to check.
